articles.title: Ariane-6 first launch: Europe's rocket blasts off for first time - BBC.com
articles.description: After a successful launch, the upper stage of the rocket goes on to experience an anomaly.
articles.content:
By Jonathan Amos, @BBCAmos, Science correspondent
Europe's big new rocket, Ariane-6, has blasted off on its maiden flight.
